column5: Can you get drill adapters for this style of auger? The ones i've seen look like they fit inside the shaft of the auger. My folding auger has the wing nut on the breakaway hinge.
Your auger with new blades will drill faster and easier than it would with the drill adaptor.. and far more holes. That thing is built for effortless speed drilling..
if you were close to me I would say come by and take the one I had made...
When the blades are sharp as said,they cut pretty much effortless. The added physical effort is good for some of us older guys.lol.
